title: 美国CISA警告 SinoTrack GPS 跟踪器存在远程控制漏洞
title_translated: US CISA warning SinoTrack GPS tracker has remote control gaps
summary: Weak identification defect and observable response difference in SinoTrack GPS equipment allow attackers to control vehicles remotely, track locations, and cut fuel. Default passwords and easily guessed device identifiers are exploited.

title: Microsoft Edge Chromium: CVE-2025-8292 Use after free in Media Stream
title_translated: Microsoft Edge Chromium: CVE-2025-8292 Use after free in Media Stream
summary: Use after free in Media Stream in Google Chrome prior to 138.0.7204.183 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.
